entries.title_d: A Nym Gunship with a badly damaged reactor needs escort out of the system.  We expect heavy resistance from Storm Squadron fighters.
entries.title: Lok System: Duty: Transport the Damaged Gunship
entries.thanks_3: The Empire is an endless supply of fools.
entries.thanks_2: I can't imagine that will be the last of them.
entries.thanks_1: There goes one wave.  More will be in the area.
entries.taunt_3: By Imperial decree, you will be destroyed.
entries.taunt_1: You will pay for your lack of discression.
entries.reason_3: We will be an irresistable target for those Imperial fighters.  We must be cautious.
entries.reason_2: I don't imagine we will have a peaceful trip today.
entries.reason_1: Be on your toes, we have reason to suspect Storm Squadron knows of our weakened state and will deem us a target of opportunity.
entries.quest_rendezvous_d: Travel here to meet the gunship for escort.
entries.quest_location_d: The gunship will travel through the system to a safe jump point.
entries.quest_escort_d: The gunship has had bad reactor damage.  Their shielding and weapon system will not be enough to ward off the Storm Squadron fighters on their own.
entries.goodbye_2: Making the jump to hyperspace now.
entries.found_loc: \#pcontrast3 Nav Computer: < \#pcontrast1 Rendezvous point locked in. \#pcontrast3 >
entries.failed_protect: \#pcontrast3 You have failed to protect the gunship.
entries.failed_destroy: \#pcontrast3 The gunship was destroyed, you fail this mission.
entries.attack_stopped: \#pcontrast3 Tactical Comptuer: < \#pcontrast1 Hostile activity has ceased.  \#pcontrast3 >
entries.attack_notify: \#pcontrast3 Tactical Computer: < \#pcontrast1 Hostile craft detected on attack vector. \#pcontrast3 >
entries.arrived_at_loc: \#pcontrast3 Nav Computer: < \#pcontrast1 Designated rednezvous point reached. \#pcontrast3 >
entries.abort: We are taking off, this craft is in no condition to fight on its own.
